    Pointer

    public final class STBTTPackedchar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRange(java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, float, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer)
